trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controlar genera el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> eventos cuando un botón Insertar (un botón con su `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Insert") dentro del control se hace clic, pero antes del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserta el registro.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esto le permite proporcionar un controlador de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como la codificación HTML los valores de un registro antes de insertarlo en el origen de datos, siempre que se produce este evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
